title: Wine Goblet
description: Blue wine goblet with Persian inscriptions in white enamel enclosed in oval wreaths of gilding. The oval wreaths are repeated three times; between each are pairs of flowerets in white enamel.
medium: Translucent deep blue glass; free blown and enameled; tooled on the pontil
dimensions:
6 x 3 in. (15.2 x 7.6 cm)
Diameter of top: 2 15/16 in. (7.5 cm)
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles K. Wilkinson in honor of Irma L. Fraad

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
